SEARCH
Module com.gluonhq.richtextarea
Package com.gluonhq.richtextarea.model

Class ParagraphDecoration

java.lang.Object
com.gluonhq.richtextarea.model.ParagraphDecoration
All Implemented Interfaces:
Decoration
public class ParagraphDecoration extends Object implements Decoration
ParagraphDecoration is a Decoration that can be applied to a fragment of text in order to style the paragraph that contains such fragment.
